website_summaries.verdict: A unique cutlery set ideal for camping. Hyper portable; turn the canvas bag into a handy display cutlery holder for easy access.
pros: A convenient and very portable cutlery set in handy organizer canvas shell case
Converts to a standalone display stand
Protects the cutlery from scratches due to its heavy nylon blend construction
Even includes a set of steel chop sticks
cons: Some users find that the knives and chopsticks can sometimes slide out if carried upside down

customer_reviews.title: Built to last, not bendy junk.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this almost a year ago and held off on review until I had a chance to use. Several uses in past year and am very satisfied. These are sturdy utensils, not bendy crap major camping merchants pass off as camping utensils. Don't buy the cheap crap, buy decent stuff that will last you for life, like this set. Edit: So, three years later, I just have to say we really love this set. Wife always comments how nice and sturdy the set is. We just transitioned to RV camping, now it stays in the trailer.
customer_reviews.author: SigDigitTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Great budget camping / at home kitchen set.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I use these everyday to replace a 10 year old set I got from a brick and mortar store. I am planning to order a second set! No rust or pitting after 30 dishwasher cycles. These are light weight, but strong. We have not had issues with any of them bending under use. I really like the carry bag (I have the orange one).
customer_reviews.author: dogdaysindurham

customer_reviews.title: The flatware itself looks nice, and also appears to be sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Checked this out upon arrival (but haven't used it yet). The case is made of heavy material and the velcro closure seems secure when closed. The flatware itself looks nice, and also appears to be sturdy. We will be giving it a heavy use test run on our 11 day camping trip in July, so I will update this following that trip with more specifics. Pros: - Well Made Case - Sturdy Flatware - Dishwasher safe Cons: - No flap on the top to ensure they stay in the case
customer_reviews.author: GaiaWolf

customer_reviews.title: First Class
customer_reviews.text: Best set of camping utensils out there . Very well made with a solid feel. I have seen worse going for much higher price. The price may be cheap , but the product is first class. I have bought 2 sets of these now. OH and nobody gave me anything for this review. It is such a good deal and set I have to say so. If they have a draw back I can't find it. Not sure why the chop sticks is about the only thing I can that might be a non positive. They shipped very fast also.
customer_reviews.author: James T.

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: It’s a cute set to leave in the vehicle. I can’t stand using plastic, not because I’m an environmentalist, but I don’t want to stab my fork into food and break off. Had that happen too many times....I even bought an 8pk of steak 🥩 knives 🔪 (4 to go with another set). I’m one of those that if I need to cut something wether it’s peeling an apple or cutting a steak, I can with no issues! All in all, I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Paz

customer_reviews.title: On our second one, but we like it a lot.
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this to go in our camp box. The first one we ordered came with poor stitching on the clasp that holds it shut, so we had to return and replace it. The new one seems to be fine. I will say that the silverware in the kit had some imperfections, but we don't really care about that as long as it works.
customer_reviews.author: I. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Item as pictured
customer_reviews.text: ordered in July 2019 and the item I received matched the picture exactly. It did not come with a plastic/clear flap but rather one made of the same material as the travel case. The silverware is basic and sturdy. At this price point, I feel the item is of great value and should serve our purposes very well.
customer_reviews.author: DIYer

customer_reviews.title: Nice set for camping or a picnic
customer_reviews.text: We have a camping trailer and this is perfect for us. We bought two sets and we're happy with the product this far. Easy to keep organized and easy to grab if your wanting to eat outside in a hurry.
customer_reviews.author: Zachry Checketts

customer_reviews.title: Great for camping!
customer_reviews.text: We camp once a year and have to remember to pack utensils for our trip. It is nice to have something ready and accessible. With COVID we recently took a camper van trip, so it was super easy to keep everything organized and clean within the pouch. The utensils have a good weight and it was worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Buzy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great product and we are pleased with this set after ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product and we are pleased with this set after two camping trips. The only item that I might recommend is to add some type of a strap that would secure the utensils inside the pouch. This is not a huge concern that would prevent me from purchasing this product again. Overall, five star product!
customer_reviews.author: Rad

customer_reviews.title: Knifes are not very sharp & uncomfortable to hold
customer_reviews.text: While I love the case these come in, the knifes are not very sharp at all, you basically just have to use blunt force and pressure to cut anything with them. They are also very uncomfortable to hold, but that might be because of the nature of the super flat and thus space saving design.
customer_reviews.author: Working Mom

customer_reviews.title: A great camping set!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great deal for the price. The silverware is pretty sturdy. The carrying case is really nice as well, it doesn’t feel cheap at all. The slots for the silverware are built to hold only one piece in each slot. Just mentioning that in case anyone is planning on stacking multiple of the same size in each slot. It won’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Andre Porter

customer_reviews.title: great set for camping
customer_reviews.text: I like the kit. Our first set of camp utensils was plastic but this is much better quality. The advantage of the plastic is they we color coded so everyone knew what belong to whom. These are all the same but much more sturdy. I have know idea why they decided to put one set of chop sticks in there but they did.
customer_reviews.author: T. Crowe

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Used these utensils and I am pleased with the quality. They have a pouch and it’s easy to store them back and keep them organized. I put them in a drawer and small enough to not take up so much room our camper without loosing or them rolling around!
customer_reviews.author: Chong

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Got it for our camping trip
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Got it for our camping trip. Exactly as described. It was missing a knife and I contacted them and they immediately shipped out a whole new set of knives! Great product and great customer service. Will order from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa Linton-Smith

customer_reviews.title: Peefect
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for camping and it's perfect. I car camp, so space and weight isn't a big deal, but they aren't heavy. I like that I can just roll out my flatware and it's all there, no digging through a box wondering where that other fork is.
customer_reviews.author: Tiny Moose

customer_reviews.title: This was just what we needed to complete out camping ...
customer_reviews.text: This was just what we needed to complete out camping dishware set. The utensils are well made and strong as opposed to flimsy. While plastic knives, forks and spoons are cheaper, they just don't hold up well. These will last for a long time. The roll up storage pouch is very handy for storage and transport with our camping gear.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, durable, easy to clean, love them
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, durable, easy to clean, love them. They even have holes on the ends of each piece so you can put a ring through them and make sets. Super awesome buy for a super cheap price. They’re better than the ones in my kitchen lol
customer_reviews.author: TForrest30

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Good product! It looks better in person than in the photo. The lining is practical. The only criticism of this product is that it is not Stainless Steel. If so, it would be an extraordinary product!
customer_reviews.author: Gina Strusi

customer_reviews.title: The case could use some elastic or something to better secure the knives and chopsticks
customer_reviews.text: The case could use some elastic or something to better secure the knives and chopsticks. Due to the curved nature of forks and spoon those seem to be held in place. This can't be said for the knives and chopsticks. I will be looking into ways to correct this without returning the item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is so cute!
customer_reviews.text: I have not had a chance to use the product, as it has just arrived, but it is so cute and the little roll up case is so well made. I'm pleased with the description to product match. The flatware isn't very fancy, but it's for camping so... works for me.
customer_reviews.author: BB in ATL

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: Excellent set to compliment my wealer's camping utensil set. Always get compliments on them when we are out camping. Package was received on time and works as great as it looks! Thank you so much rookydeals!
customer_reviews.author: Nikko Azan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! I got 2 sets to make sure I had enough for our group of 7 at all times and they are of fantastic quality and they're so convenient to roll up or lay out. My mom loved mine enough that she wants to purchase her own set!
customer_reviews.author: Kasey

customer_reviews.title: Picnic cutlery
customer_reviews.text: I just received this yesterday, haven't had a chance to use it. Checking it out, seems to have a nice weight to it, stainless so sturdy for sure. Nice little pouch to keep it in, camping, hiking, even a nice little picnic. we are going to use it in our RV. Check out casual camping mugs to go along with this item, they are really nice coffee mugs.
customer_reviews.author: wayne abchmeier

customer_reviews.title: Great silverware case for my RV
customer_reviews.text: I was using a Ziploc bag for my silverware in my RV, but it always bothered me how it looked. This thing is great. So many options, clearly organized, and compact.
customer_reviews.author: jasbrosauce

customer_reviews.title: NICE QUALITY IN THIS SET
customer_reviews.text: Way better than expected at this price. Mounted the set in my van on the wall and looks great too. And not the cheap type of stainless steel... these have some heft for their size and are polished smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Casey F in SF

customer_reviews.title: Great Value on Cutlery
customer_reviews.text: Nice, tight collection. Bought 2 sets for our family of six. Fits well in packs, storage boxes and RV drawers. Easy to clean - just what I expected. Great case. Definitely a good buy. Only thing I didn’t like is easy utensil came wrapped in plastic - that was a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Albert C

customer_reviews.title: Good solid camping silverware.
customer_reviews.text: Good solid silverware set for camping. Not flimsy like some of the other camping cutlery. Rolls up neatly in heavy duty case and doesn't take up a lot of space when packed away.
customer_reviews.author: CMaC

customer_reviews.title: Great full size cutlery roll up pouch and utinsels...
customer_reviews.text: Great set of full sized cutlery all in a roll up pouch ready for the camping trip. Looks quality made. I will update after first camping use...
customer_reviews.author: CJHoffman

customer_reviews.title: Reccommended. Only complaint is that the rollup pouch does ...
customer_reviews.text: Reccommended. Only complaint is that the rollup pouch does not roll tight enough if you use the velcro clousers. I roll it tight and secure it with a short ball bungie. Problem solved.
customer_reviews.author: Biggins

customer_reviews.title: Great Camping Cutlery
customer_reviews.text: We use this for every camping trip - there's even a pair of chopsticks! They are sturdy and easy to clean, and very lightweight. The carrying couch is quite useful to keep them all together.
customer_reviews.author: Rabbit91

customer_reviews.title: Sister likes ir
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my sister because she’s always borrowing my utensil set for camping. She seems to like it. I also appreciate that it comes in its own carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: Mystufff

customer_reviews.title: Great product- Awesome price!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my camping sister and brother in law. They said they'll toss it into their bin of camping gear so it is all together and easily accessible for each trip!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Desmo

customer_reviews.title: The carrying case makes this really convenient.
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate the carrying case for this silverware. The whole package lives in my camping kitchen tote. I'm glad my silverware doesn't slip out and fall all over the place anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Mays

customer_reviews.title: Great for camping
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little kit for camping, picnics, or the beach. The utensils are light weight but quite sturdy. The case keeps them all organized as no clean.
customer_reviews.author: TJR

customer_reviews.title: Purchase these
customer_reviews.text: Study, easy to clean, great set for camping, self contained and takes up little space
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy n nice storage case. Great for my camper.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, storage case, and seems sturdy enough to be used in my RV And camping. I’m happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: DQ

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit
customer_reviews.text: these are quite sturdy. Better than the "cafeteria utensils" we had in school.
customer_reviews.author: James C. Moore

customer_reviews.title: nice cutlery set
customer_reviews.text: I like this set. Nice quality and good price. The canvas carrier keeps everything organized.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dittman

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and a terrific price
customer_reviews.text: Solid metal and durable. Not made of the usual pot metal you find from overseas products. Great quality for a terrific price!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Good Enough
customer_reviews.text: Works for the purpose of our pop up. 4 sets of everything but only one set of chop sticks....
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Wharton

customer_reviews.title: Nice for picnics
customer_reviews.text: Cutlery set came in a nice rollable pouch. Fit fine in my picnic basket, now I won't have to use plastic stuff, much for ecological this way.
customer_reviews.author: Morris Way

customer_reviews.title: Traveling cutlery
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Could keep things organised and in place. Small. I like it
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Pearce

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars For Sure 👍🏿
customer_reviews.text: This set far exceeded my expectations! We are using them for a three week hotel stay. Then, will be used for camping. If you like sushi, the chop sticks are a great bonus! Would definitely recommend 👍🏿
customer_reviews.author: Sandi H.

customer_reviews.title: Picnic Utensil Set
customer_reviews.text: Nice compact case, fit's great in backpack light weight. easy way to keep everything organized . Easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Victor Lopez III

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: bought many of these types of sets before, they all came with acrylic handles and would periodically break. these are holding up better
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Amazing set
customer_reviews.text: We leave this in the camper and they are a huge hit.
customer_reviews.author: orejas

customer_reviews.title: No comment
customer_reviews.text: Item as advertised well see how they hold up over time but would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Fullerton

customer_reviews.title: Great seller, expedited my shipping in order to make my departure date.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly in my camper van where space is limited. I like that the holder keeps noise down while driving down the road.
customer_reviews.author: Maur

customer_reviews.title: Very good set
customer_reviews.text: Handy to be able to hang it up so you can see if all the cutlery got put away.
customer_reviews.author: Bombtech

customer_reviews.title: Great for RV or camping
customer_reviews.text: Takes up little space. Will maybe up grade silverware but keep pouch
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As portable as you can get!
customer_reviews.text: I'm always looking for the most portable, convenient tools for camping, whether it's in a tent or RV; this set is great,storage doubles as the 'stand' for easy access, nothing is loose in camping bags, also nice for tailgating, highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Montanafan

customer_reviews.title: Item received did not match what was pictured
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a black one and received a blue one, the flap that ties down over the utensils is cheap plastic, not the same material as the case and does not have any way of securing it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, but the silverware is useless
customer_reviews.text: These are not stainless steel. They are some metal coated with a silver colored coating(?) After using the set ONCE, the silver coating started peeling off of the spoon and the fork. Had to discontinue using it - a shame. Looks good, but the silverware is useless.

customer_reviews.title: Prefect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed.. We just started camping we didn't want to use plasticware.

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set. Exactly what I wanted. Only issue. Why only 1 set off chop sticks? Should be 2 sets.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great buy used it on my recent camping trip worked great and the way it folds up allowes for easy access

customer_reviews.title: Camping
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Great for camping trips already bought a second.

customer_reviews.title: Quality tableware for car campiing
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set. We also picked up the kitchen utensil set. Both are very handy for organizing car camping "stuff" and were surprisingly great quality.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfect for my tailgate party trailer. Pouch seems good quality. Very pleased with this product.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Definitely recommended

customer_reviews.title: Good for camping
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality stainless steel. Normal sized cutlery. Good for camping. Also purchased camping travel cooking utensils with matching bag to this bag. Most likely wont be using the chopsticks but they are in there if needed.

customer_reviews.title: Well made and looks good
customer_reviews.text: This set is well made, looks good and the travel case is a nice bonus.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great deal. Doesn't take much space and should hold up forever.
customer_reviews.author: thomas p. stephens

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I use them for outdoor eating in the summer. I purchased a number of sets. They go through the dishwasher and hold up very well. Only recommendation would be to sell them without the holding case.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. As described. We tried it out in the backyard and will take camping this weekend. They are light weight, easy to clean and sturdy. I like how they can stand up and the roller is really nice. Great product!!

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction. Seems like it will last a long time.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: High quality set at a very reasonable price. Would buy again!

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, nice sturdy, enclosed, bag with flap to keep items for falling out and the wife love it for camping..

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, simple set!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for our small family to go camping, and they're perfect. Quality is good, they wash up easily and the little pouch keeps everything organized.

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but hand wash only.
customer_reviews.text: Hand wash only. Rusty spots appeared after one wash in the dishwasher. Otherwise looks great, and keeps everything nice and organized!

customer_reviews.title: Great set! Nice smooth texture and extra space in the bag!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Nice case and texture, easy to clean. You can also wrap other utencils inside because there is extra room!

customer_reviews.title: Make in China but overall good silverware.
customer_reviews.text: Silverware. They hold food. Make in China but overall good silverware.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Stylish Set of Eating Utensils
customer_reviews.text: Nice set of eating utensils for camping. Easy to carry in a stylish carrying case.

customer_reviews.title: I like how thick the fabric is and the clear plastic ...
customer_reviews.text: These utensils are quite thick and durable. The traveling case is quite handy and makes the whole set feel tidy. I like how thick the fabric is and the clear plastic screen is a nice addition for keeping the dust and dirt off the silverware.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: I received 8 spoons and 0 forks. I would like to receive the 4 missing forks.

customer_reviews.text: Another high quality product from Wealers! I'm quickly learning that this will be a go to brand in stocking our RV with camping cooking products. High quality camping utensils with a handy storage bag that neatly contains the utensils.

customer_reviews.text: Very nice solid but light weight cutlery. Case is attractive and holds everything securely. The chop sticks are a nice bonus.

product_meta.title: 13 Piece Stainless Steel Family Cutlery Picnic Utensil Set with Travel Case for Camping | Hiking | BBQs - Includes Forks | Spoons | Knifes | Chopstick, Plus Nylon Commuter Case
product_meta.description:
THE ULTIMATE CUTLERY TRAVEL KIT AND SILVERWARE STAND!

Our cutlery holder is the perfect roadside companion for traveling, no matter the occasion. The kit opens
up and locks into place, and it creates an awesome utensil display stand for your 
table spread. 

ORGANIZATION: Each fork, spoon or knife sits neatly in its own secure compartment for easy access. In a vertical position, not
only is the silverware more visible; it also adds a lovely colored accent and enhances the appeal of your picnic
or party table. 

FEATURES:

WEATHER RESISTANT SHELLCASE.

It can be placed next to, or directly exposed to water as it provides layered protection for silverware. 
In the case of a fall, woven nylon outer shell casing will prevent your cutlery from getting 
scratched, marred or disfigured. The case also protects your cutlery from moisture and liquids 
so they stay dry.

SPACE SAVER | STORAGEORGANIZER

The pouch takes up minimal space in your rucksack, glove compartment, or luggage carrier. 
Saves on essential room in tight areas, and it makes for an awesome center piece. Holds all
your silverware in one location for easy retrieval of your eating utensils.

-Convertible - Stand | Travel Pouch
-Individual cutlery compartments
-Clatter Proof
-Portable
- Unfolded: L14.5” x W9” 

INCLUDES:

- 1 Cutlery Storage Case with Handle
- 4 Forks
- 4 Spoons
- 4 knives
- 1 Pair Chopsticks
feature_bullets: CONVERTIBLE: Functions as a standalone display stand so cutlery is elevated in full view for easy utensil access. In a standing position, it also saves on space in tights spots with limited room. Neatly folds to transport eating utensils to your next event.

DURABLE | RUGGED: Made with tough woven cotton and linen it protects your utensils from the elements, falls and has multiple compartments so flatware stays sturdy and doesn’t clatter during transportation.

FASHIONABLE | STYLISH: A contemporary design with a woven multicolored pattern it’s sure to be a hit at your next boat ride, barbeque or camp. Blends in nicely with existing dinnerware décor and adds a vibrant splash of color to your spread no matter what the occasion.

PORTABLE | TRAVEL FRIENDLY: Perfect for family outings to the Beach, Park or picnic and camping. Folded, the pouch measures 9.5” x 5”x 1” and fits neatly into travel luggage or it can be hand held (Built in handle).
DISWASHER SAFE: Cleans easily and is washer friendly. Simply wash, dry and reload the kit, and you are on your way. Item stores away easily in closets, Bins or it can be used as a drawer liner.
